questions: Who does Mr. Wang need a babysitter to look after?
article:
Babysitter wanted( )
Do you like children? Do you have free time in the afternoon? We need a babysitter for our daughter. She's six years old.
Working time: Monday to Friday, 3:00pm--6:00 pm.
Cost: $5 an hour.
We need help with: Looking after our daughter, reading to her, playing with her.
Address:  You must work at our house. We live in Changjiang Road, near the Culture Square.
Please call Mr. Wang at 0551-487-2563.
